Topic.Title: Share game to iOS (iPhone/iPad) in HTML/JS format?

Posts.EditableText:
Hi,
I noticed that if I upload a .ZIP of my game and then download/uncompress that .ZIP onto my iPhone (in the 'Files' folder), I can access the game files, but when I start the game, I just get a screen with 'Restart' in the top left and nothing else.

Is there an easy way to facilitate sharing my games with iOS friends, without resorting to creating an app, or uploading to the textadventures website?
